metadata.title: CVE-2021-43299 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Stack overflow in PJSUA API when calling pjsua_player_create. An attacker-controlled 'filename' argument may cause a buffer overflow since it is copied to a fixed-size stack buffer without any size validation.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
